name: Mayer Brown Europe-Brussels LLP
goal: Mayer Brown Europe-Brussels LLP provides counseling, litigation, investigation and strategic advice to clients in relation to EU law and the EU's institutions and courts.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Mayer Brown Europe-Brussels LLP follows a wide range of EU policies and legislation, most notably trade and customs. However, most, or in some cases even all of our activities do not fall within the scope of the register.
